<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Reflexive Shield](/Feats.aspx?ID=383) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Fighter" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=71" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 148 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Bastion](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=49) (Level 8)

</column>

---

You can use your shield to fend off the worst of area effects and other damage. When you [Raise your Shield](/Actions.aspx?ID=98), you gain your shield's circumstance bonus to Reflex saves. If you have the [Shield Block](/Feats.aspx?ID=839) reaction, damage you take as a result of a Reflex save can trigger that reaction, even if the damage isn't physical damage.

<title level="2">Reflexive Shield leads to...</title>
[Improved Reflexive Shield](/Feats.aspx?ID=423)
name: Reflexive Shield
